author: Martin Myška
comment: Excellent, looks great, don't need use button anymore. No ads at me! Just for update step counter need change watch face and back on. After then will a step counter update, also sometimes show less than Google fit. Can you fix this please?  Edit: after update to Oreo missed some icons!!!

author: Jan Harley
comment: I had this app for about a month and it was most definitely 5 Stars. However, half of the icons have recently disappeared.. . And it's not much use without them.  Come on, please fix this if you want your five stars back. I'm using a Michael Kors watch

author: Antonio De Cinque
comment: Very much enjoyed the app.   However, I would like to have an option to resize the launcher handle. It seems like it is too little and sometimes the launcher gets overridden by the system launcher, which I don't want to happen.  Also, I would like the app to let me "split" the app drawer and the widget drawer into two different swipes. For example, when I swipe down I get the widget drawer and when I swipe right I get the app drawer.

This is an INCREDIBLE app and watch launcher.   But, once in a while the watch face becomes black and I have not found a simple way to fix that besides to delete cache and data.  Because of that, all customizations are deleted and I have to do it all over again.  Aside of that deal breaker bug, the app is amazing, but essentially unusable.  I am using Huawei watch 2.  Edit: I have found what crashes the launcher. Whenever I try to use the brightness bar on the widget drawer, the app crashes. A simple solution is to simply disable it in the customization tab.

author: Aa Voltz
comment: Broken after a recent update. I tried uninstalling and re-installing, but nothing works. At this point it even shows a round watch when I have the Sony Smartwatch 3 connected.  I'll put 5 stars when it works again.

author: D. Casu
comment: Suddenly stops working. Impossible to launch the app on watch. Top left drawer stops responding. App on phone shows 'not connected' warnings. Meanwhile everything else on my watch works fine. Zenwatch 2 Android Wear 2.0. //Edit: Removing app data on watch seems to fix the launch issue. But the smartphone app still can't connect.

author: Martin Dury
comment: Used to work perfectly, but latest update kills the watch app (doesn't start on watch). Found the cleaner advert intrusive & glad to see it gone. Irritating considering I've donated to support the developer.

reply.author: Mini Launcher
reply.content:
Hi Martin,
Thanks for your feedback, as a frequent traveler, myself would LOVE to have a airplane toggle, but our developer had looked into the APIs and found out there is no way for us to do it...hope Google will change this in future updates soon.

author: Richie Stapler
comment: REMOVE the unwanted ads (that occur outside the app!) ....This is malware.... Also, remove the icon that is unremovable in the notification bar. After doing so, I will update my star rating. Thank you.

author: Andrew Blessinger
comment: Used to be my favorite wear app...quick launch icon was great. Now, post 2.0 update, app won't load to the watch. So many wear apps are failing post update...why can't Google figure it out? Perhaps they don't want to...forced obsolesence anyone???

author: George Pratt
comment: A solid app that does it's job. Has some customization options that don't seem to work, like changing where the app drawer is. You can define a side in settings but it doesn't save your preference at all. Not a deal breaker at all and definitely worth installing. I just REALLY wish I could put the app drawer on the right instead of the left.

author: chris wortmann
comment: Used to work great since update, stopped working. Using S7. Bad pop up ads.  Terrible.  Hard to uninstall.  Was great but now horrible.  Bad move by developers!

author: Sergei Garcia
comment: Amazing! While it worked... It now crashes on boot and when trying to open it just says "Wear Mini Launcher has crashed". Such a pity... ZenWatch 2 on Wear 1.5

author: Skallia Ray
comment: Well... i downloaded this bc my watch is a bit hard to navigate and as soon as i downloaded this app the app stopped working. It ran for about 10 minuted then i couldn't access it again. I tried 2 times to make this app work and it just wouldnt. Sad bc this is the only launcher i actually liked the interface of.

author: Michael
comment: I try do install it in right now its stuck on  Synchronizing with apps via  Bluetooth and its neen doing that for the past 20 minutes.   I have the LG urbane with android 2.0 it sucks

author: Dave Berenson
comment: Love the Launcher more than the built in Google one. However, when I use the 'lock phone' toggle, the notification stays on the watch until I either reboot the watch our task kill everything. Other than that it is awesome and one of the first things I install & configure. *Edit* saw the cleaner app unappreciated adware... But there was a button to switch that off. Fine. However ditch the stupid permanent notification stating it's running. Android Wear ensures it runs. It's unnecessary so I've hidden that notification. Doesn't seem to impact it's functionality.

author: oo cb
comment: Everytime i increase the brightness slide.. The program closed and disappear and refuse to begin again and i had to reinstall from the beginning

author: Guillermo Wagner
comment: Used to work great but crashed and will no longer open on my LG G watch. Judging from recent reviews I'm guessing this is because of an update. Please update and fix this!

author: Josh S
comment: It is a bs app. It will take over phone administrator and is a bish to uninstall. You have to clear your app preferences in order to deactivate and finally it allowed me to uninstall.

author: Michael Mai
comment: Broken. Used to be great but no longer works unfortunately.

author: Ujal Ray
comment: Worst app ever.. kept synchronising with my fossil q Marshal whole night.. still could not sync.

author: Doug Gross
comment: Since the last few versions, it's always running in the background and uses a lot of battery. Also, since the upgrade to Android 8.0, it stopped working completely...

author: Srikanth Premkumar
comment: This is annoying... There is always notification on oreo ... saying app is running in the background 😤

author: Craig Walkup
comment: Takes a very long time just for the app to synchronize with my LG G Watch R.

author: Sam Watts
comment: Used to be amazing but no longer works, if anyone has any recommendations to replace this please post, used ever day to put phone on silent / ping phone

author: Lil Banchik
comment: I used to use this every day but since the latest update it continually disconnects even through the watch is connected and every other app works fine. I've uninstalled it.

author: Mick Hayes
comment: Broken now, used it all the time, now it's broken since recent update, very disappointed.

author: Chris Bim Woltman
comment: Keeps saying "unfortunately wear mini launcher stopped working", and just doesn't work since last update. Using smartwatch 3

author: Ian Barker
comment: Was a great launcher.. now it's utter garbage.  AVOID!!!!

author: WFmaru enduro
comment: Doesn't work with my Sony sw3 and Galaxy S7 edge... After an update...

author: Denver Gown
comment: Absoulty love this app. Works amazing with my Google glasses as I can toggle my phone's WiFi whenever I have to leave my work station, allowing me to leave my phone on charge and get the information from my glasses. Would very highly recommend this app!!!!

author: Behn Vertíz
comment: Stopped working, won't let me uninstall the app, makes the whole Settings app crash. Using Lg G6.

author: Brad Aguilar
comment: This app is great. I have had it now on 3 different watches and love it. It is a great way to get around almost all smart watches.

author: Roy Orbin
comment: Update broke the app. That was a month ago now...

author: Carlota Goyanes-Payne
comment: It just doesn't work any more

author: George Cuervos
comment: I gave this app 3 stars reluctantly.   The app has a beautiful UI that the developers have incorporated a top Android Wear brilliantly.  The app screen and toggle screen are ingenious and look great!  Bringing new life to an aging Android Wear 1.5.  It really made my Moto 360 v1 and LG G Watch, who did not get the 2.0 update, look like new watches.  When it works, it works flawlessly but there lays the problem, it doesn't always play nice with Android Wear.  At times you get a slow choppy experience even painfully slow and it gets stuck from time to time.  I have also found that on occasion Android Wear will stop working al together and I find myself having to reboot my watch.  And, if you try to adjust the screen brightness on the toggle screen, forget about it. You will get a message saying Wear Mini Launcher has stopped working, and there is nothing you can do to fix this problem.  This is at least true on my LG G Watch, didn't dare try it on my 360.  Why? Because rebooting your watch, re-syncing your apps, none of it will work.  And if you try u installing you will find that quite simply, you can't!  The only solution is to system re-set your watch, in my case both watches and what a pain that is.  In short I really like this app and wish it didn't have these issues but for now I had to delete it.  Maybe with an update the developer can address these problems, but for now I guess I'll just have to keep using the dated Android Wear 1.5 on my watches.

author: Alexander Hawkesworth
comment: was a great app until update killed it now crashes continuously. Sony smartwatch 3

author: Josh Davalos
comment: Does not work with Asus Zenwatch 2. Will rate again after it is supported.

author: Jovian Jevon
comment: Wifi hotspot toggle from watch doesn't work anymore

author: Ron Chusid
comment: Frequently stops working. Have to uninstall and reinstall to get it working.

author: Alex Grant
comment: Can't seem to get rid of the ongoing notification in my notifications bar.
